narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This facility meets the minimum applicable regulations and standards to a class "C" license and licensing may
proceed.
The applicant will mail the licensing fee to the Eastern Regional Office.
No regulated activity may occur until the license is issued.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Zoo CFO.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
